## 2021


[NWFSC RWorkflow Workshops 2021](https://rverse-tutorials.github.io/RWorkflow-NWFSC-2021/) 8 week webinare on Git, GitHub, R packaging. All material and recorded lectures are online.

[R3 Train](https://noaa-iea.github.io/r3-train/) 8-week webinar training series on Reproducible Reporting with R for marine ecological indicators, sponsored by the Working Group on the Northwest Atlantic Regional Sea

## 2020

[2020 R Workshop for Social Scientists](https://emilymarkowitz-noaa.github.io/RWorkshopForSocialScientists/) workshop by NOAA Fisheries social scientists. Focus on data analysis and advanced topics.

[NWFSC RWorkflow Workshops 2020](https://rverse-tutorials.github.io/RWorkflow-NWFSC-2020/) Git, GitHub, R, R packages
